name: Messiverse: Dance of the GOAT
metadata:
{"name": "Messiverse: The Last Dance 1/799", "description": "It is with no doubt that the World Cup 2022 in Qatar will go down as one of the most memorable moments in history. It will be remembered by generations to come, and we will be there to tell the tales with few of our own exaggerations. 

By winning the World Cup 2022 with a remarkable performance, Lionel Messi might have cleared out the most debatable question in todayb�s world of Football of "Who is the Greatest footballer Of All Time (GOAT)?". Debate aside, winning the world cup was a memorable moment for Lionel Messi, his team, Argentina, and the whole world. Lionel Messi has proven himself that he is not only talented but also committed to doing the impossible for his nation and fans. 

In 2022 World Cup Lionel Messi played a very important role in helping his country win the tournament. His performance was so spectacular that it became an internet sensation which still lives on today and forever! In so many considerations, Messi does deserve the name Messiah, and the GOAT. (Still arguably)

For now, just try to own this piece of history "The Last Dance", a digital art of Lionel Messi holding the World Cup 2022 in Qatar. Only 799 copies will be produced, resembling 799 goals that Messi scored at Club and International Level.
", "image": "ipfs://bafybeigx3qdbzjsrq3i424eg4hzflccaiyvwkhjehzd7gnqa6w2ao2a5ry", "animation_url": "ipfs://bafybeidsxecsidowzpkhpqyi4dqdt74mzsxddrogbb27ovolga563abuuu", "properties": {"number": 1, "name": "Messiverse: The Last Dance"}}
